metadata.description: Before the wedding, enjoy these five Prelude to the Wedding stories centering on Robin, Nightwing, Batgirl, Red Hood, and Harley Quinn, as they face off against Ra's Al Ghul, Hush, The Riddler, Anarky, and The Joker in the final build up to Batman and Catwoman tying the knot!
metadata.name: Batman: Prelude to the Wedding
